MARK 15.25 wasuh þan ƕeila þridjo, jah ushramidedun ina.
MARK 15.26 jah was ufarmeli fairinos is ufarmeliþ:
sa þiudans Iudaie.
MARK 15.27 jah miþ imma ushramidedun twans waidedjans, ainana af taihswon jah ainana af hleidumein is.
MARK 15.28 jah usfullnoda þata gamelido þata qiþando:
jah miþ unsibjaim rahniþs was.
MARK 15.29 jah þai faurgaggandans wajameridedun ina, wiþondans haubida seina jah qiþandans:
o sa gatairands þo alh jah bi þrins dagans gatimrjands þo, MARK 15.30 nasei þuk silban jah atsteig af þamma galgin!
MARK 15.31 samaleiko jah þai auhumistans gudjans bilaikandans ina miþ sis misso miþ þaim bokarjam qeþun:
anþarans ganasida, iþ sik silban ni mag ganasjan.
MARK 15.32 sa Xristus, sa þiudans Israelis, atsteigadau nu af þamma galgin, ei gasaiƕaima jah galaubjaima.
jah þai miþushramidans imma idweitidedun imma.
MARK 15.33 jah biþe warþ ƕeila saihsto, riqis warþ ana allai airþai und ƕeila niundon.
MARK 15.34 jah niundon ƕeilai wopida Iesus stibnai mikilai qiþands:
ailoe ailoe, lima sibakþanei,
þatei ist gaskeiriþ:
guþ meins, guþ meins, duƕe mis bilaist?
MARK 15.35 jah sumai þize atstandandane gahausjandans qeþun:
sai, Helian wopeiþ.
MARK 15.36 þragjands þan ains jah gafulljands swam akeitis, galagjands ana raus, dragkida ina qiþands:
let, ei saiƕam qimaiu Helias athafjan ina.
MARK 15.37 iþ Iesus aftra letands stibna mikila uzon.
MARK 15.38 jah faurhah als disskritnoda in twa iupaþro und dalaþ.
MARK 15.39 gasaiƕands þan sa hundafaþs sa atstandands in andwairþja is þatei swa hropjands uzon, qaþ:
bi sunjai, sa manna sa sunus was gudis.
MARK 15.40 wesun-uþ-þan qinons fairraþro saiƕandeins, in þaimei was Marja so Magdalene jah Marja Iakobis þis minnizins jah Iosezis aiþei jah Salome.
MARK 15.41 jah þan was in Galeilaia, jah laistidedun ina jah andbahtidedun imma, jah anþaros managos þozei miþiddjedun imma in Iairusalem.

MARK 15.42 jah juþan at andanahtja waurþanamma, unte was paraskaiwe, saei ist fruma sabbato, MARK 15.43 qimands Iosef af Areimaþaias, gaguds ragineis, saei was jah silba beidands þiudangardjos gudis, anananþjands galaiþ inn du Peilatau jah baþ þis leikis Iesuis.
MARK 15.44 iþ Peilatus sildaleikida ei is juþan gaswalt;
jah athaitands þana hundafaþ frah ina juuþan gadauþnodedi.
MARK 15.45 jah finþands at þamma hundafada fragaf þata leik Iosefa.
MARK 15.46 jah usbugjands lein jah usnimands ita biwand þamma leina jah galagida ita in hlaiwa, þatei was gadraban us staina, jah atwalwida stain du daura þis hlaiwis.
MARK 15.47 iþ Marja so Magdalene jah Marja Iosezis seƕun ƕar galagiþs wesi.
MARK 16.1 jah inwisandins sabbate dagis Marja so Magdalene jah Marja so Iakobis jah Salome usbauhtedun aromata, ei atgaggandeins gasalbodedeina ina.
MARK 16.2 jah filu air þis dagis afarsabbate atiddjedun du þamma hlaiwa at urrinnandin sunnin.
MARK 16.3 jah qeþun du sis misso:
ƕas afwalwjai unsis þana stain af daurom þis hlaiwis?
MARK 16.4 jah insaiƕandeins gaumidedun þammei afwalwiþs ist sa stains;
was auk mikils abraba.
MARK 16.5 jah atgaggandeins in þata hlaiw gaseƕun juggalauþ sitandan in taihswai biwaibidana wastjai ƕeitai;
jah usgeisnodedun.
MARK 16.6 þaruh qaþ du im:
ni faurhteiþ izwis,
Iesu sokeiþ Nazoraiu þana ushramidan;
nist her,
urrais,
sai þana staþ þarei galagidedun ina.
MARK 16.7 akei gaggiþ qiþiduh du siponjam is jah du Paitrau þatei faurbigaggiþ izwis in Galeilaian;
þaruh ina gasaiƕiþ, swaswe qaþ izwis.
MARK 16.8 jah usgaggandeins af þamma hlaiwa gaþlauhun;
diz-sat-uh-þan ijos reiro jah usfilmei, jah ni qeþun mannhun waiht;
ohtedun sis auk.
MARK 16.9 usstandands þan in maurgin frumin sabbato ataugida sik frumist Marjin þizai Magdalene, af þizaiei uswarp sibun unhulþons.
